original_text: Beloved, I pray that all may go well with you and that you may be in good health, as it goes well with your soul.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자여 네 영혼이 잘됨 같이 네가 범사에 잘되고 강건하기를 내가 간구하노라

sentences.original_text: I pray that all may go well with you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 모든 일이 잘 되기를 기도하며

sentences.original_text: and that you may be in good health,
as it goes well with your soul.
